metadata.Title: CVE-2009-0195 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Heap-based buffer overflow in Xpdf 3.02pl2 and earlier, CUPS 1.3.9, and probably other products, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a PDF file with crafted JBIG2 symbol dictionary segments.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> Probably the same issue as CVE-2009-0146 fixed by usn-759-1 even though the CVE is not listed in it sbeattie> ipe uses system pdflatex

criterions.comment: libextractor package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
poppler package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.10.5-1ubuntu2').
